## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindexes">SlotIndexes</a> pass.

This pass assigns indexes to each instruction.

Definition at line 297 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/slotindexes-h">SlotIndexes.h</a>.

### removeMachineInstrFromMaps() {#a2aace9fd8246b0bdb9c352c5aa32f88d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SlotIndexes::removeMachineInstrFromMaps (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, bool AllowBundled=false)</>}>
Removes machine instruction (bundle) <code>MI</code> from the mapping.

This should be called before <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ac2421adbb9996e1b15f03a8abb6c70a8">MachineInstr::eraseFromParent()</a> is used to remove a whole bundle or an unbundled instruction. If <code>AllowBundled</code> is set then this can be used on a bundled instruction; however, this exists to support handleMoveIntoBundle, and in general removeSingleMachineInstrFromMaps should be used instead.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/slotindexes-h/#l00577">577</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/slotindexes-h">SlotIndexes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/slotindexes-cpp/#l00127">127</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/slotindexes-cpp">SlotIndexes.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Removes a single machine instruction <code>MI</code> from the mapping.

This should be called before <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a9891e442de101ced8a1533a71511dbed">MachineInstr::eraseFromBundle()</a> is used to remove a single instruction (out of a bundle).
